alert.note: Alert for Absaroka, Beartooth Mountains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued November 07 at 12:53AM MST until November 08 at 3:00PM MST by NWS Billings
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM THIS MORNING TO 3 PM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Periods of heavy snow. Total snow accumulations of 10 to 16 inches expected. * WHERE...Absaroka/Beartooth Mountains. * WHEN...From 6 AM this morning to 3 PM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Activities in the back country will be impacted by heavy accumulating snow. Limited visibility should be expected at times in blowing snow. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Another period of heavy snow is possible late Tuesday night through Wednesday.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For the latest road conditions, call 5 1 1.
